results.name: python-sdk
results.description: The official Python SDK for Model Context Protocol servers and clients

results.name: fastapi_mcp
results.description: Expose your FastAPI endpoints as Model Context Protocol (MCP) tools, with Auth!

results.name: mcp-agent
results.description: Build effective agents using Model Context Protocol and simple workflow patterns

results.name: excel-mcp-server
results.description: A Model Context Protocol server for Excel file manipulation

results.name: mcp-context-forge
results.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) Gateway & Registry. Serves as a central management point for tools, resources, and prompts that can be accessed by MCP-compatible LLM applications. Converts REST API endpoints to MCP, composes virtual MCP servers with added security and observability, and converts between protocols (stdio, SSE, Streamable HTTP).

results.name: arxiv-mcp-server
results.description: A Model Context Protocol server for searching and analyzing arXiv papers

results.name: MultiAgentPPT
results.description: MultiAgentPPT 是一个集成了 A2A（Agent2Agent）+ MCP（Model Context Protocol）+ ADK（Agent Development Kit） 架构的智能化演示文稿生成系统，支持通过多智能体协作和流式并发机制

results.name: Office-PowerPoint-MCP-Server
results.description: A MCP (Model Context Protocol) server for PowerPoint manipulation using python-pptx. This server provides tools for creating, editing, and manipulating PowerPoint presentations through the MCP protocol.

results.name: Office-Word-MCP-Server
results.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for creating, reading, and manipulating Microsoft Word documents. This server enables AI assistants to work with Word documents through a standardized interface, providing rich document editing capabilities.

results.name: mcp-server-qdrant
results.description: An official Qdrant Model Context Protocol (MCP) server implementation
